column2: an A.M. Eatery////This spot is never NOT packed with a line that often forms along the sidewalk. This is a chain found in TX
column5: and I happened to visit the location in Montrose in Houston. I found that the food was good
column7: and fills a niche in the neighborhood. The service leaves much to be desired. I went on a Friday a bit before lunchtime and there was a 25-35 min wait
column8: which I typically see as a good sign.
